name: Pitch Changer
description: The Pitch Changer allows you to change the pitch of an audio and listen to it.

name: Test Manager
description: Manage your tests at one platform and set a timer for each! I first thought of this project when I was taking a test in the classroom. I wanted to make a giant clock on the computer screen in my classroom, so I built one here. However, since people were saying that this can be a timer for other things, I added more features such as adding names to tests and stuff. (now it's more like a todo list)

name: Mandelbrot Fractal
description: The Mandelbrot fractal is a famous thing in mathematics known for its fine details. Although it may be a bit slow and only supports zooming, I've made it look as nice as possible.

name: LightChat
description: A light-mode chat that features half of Discord. Aside from the ability to send messages and a UI that I think was amazing, it has a type indicator, MarkDown formatting support, an always-changing background, and the ability to change the theme color from white to any other color.

name: VStart
description: My first ever coding project. VStart is a browser homepage that contains what most home pages have, and it's cleaner than most others (2345 home page, etc.).

name: Python C++ Compiler
description:
Tired of opening your IDE or terminal to run C++ files? Use this compiler!
I wrote a Python program that runs the GCC compiling command and running the .exe file afterwords. I then packaged the compiler into an application and made it open C++ files by default. It's convenient, but it's also slow (it takes about 0.9s to run a Hello World program).

name: WLSA School House
description:
A thing.

This one will go big if things go well.
